item.title: Herblore tester
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Ok, I wan’t somebody to try this for me 

//Attack Potion
if((itemUsed == 249 && useWith == 249 && playerLevel[20] >= 1)) {
sendMessage("You use the Guam leaf with the Eye of newt");
addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[12]), 12);
deleteItem(249, getItemSlot(249), 1);
deleteItem(91, getItemSlot(91), 1);
additem(91, 1);
}
if((itemUsed == 91 && useWith == 211 && playerLevel[20] >=  1)) { 
sendMessage("You use the eye of newt with the vial of water");
sendMessage("You make a attack potion!");
addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[20]), 20);
deleteItem(91, getItemSlot(91), 1);
deleteItem(211, getItemSlot(211), 1);
addItem(121, 1); 
}else{
sendMessage("You need 1 herblore to make this!");
}

Basically… Use a guam on a vial of water, Then use an eye of newt on the unfinished potion… And tell me if it all worked, I can’t get connected to a server right now… So I need somebody to tell me if it works…[br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2007, 02:09:37 AM[/size][hr]Forgot, Search for

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin"))

and add under the last bracket

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin"))
{
println_debug("Item: "+useWith+" used with item: "+itemUsed);
println_debug("usedwithslot: "+usedWithSlot+" itemusedslot: "+itemUsedSlot+" usewith: "+useWith+" p4: "+p4+" itemused: "+itemUsed+" p6: "+p6);
}

Add under that last bracket :)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2007, 02:11:35 AM[/size][hr]I’ll be back tomorrow, Tell me when you test it out =\
